import.title: Car Import from Europe
import.subtitle: We specialize in importing premium cars from the best European auctions. Our team of experts provides full support for the transaction and guarantees transparency at every stage.

whyEurope.title: Why buy a car from Europe?
benefits: Better quality of cars and their equipment
Transparent history of operation and maintenance
No corrosion thanks to quality roads
Better price compared to the local market
Greater choice of modifications and configurations
Full support for import and registration

items.title: Wide selection of cars
items.description: Access to thousands of cars from the best European auctions.

items.title: Verified history
items.description: Full transparency of the car's history, including service records and accidents.

items.title: Better price
items.description: Significant savings compared to the local market thanks to direct import.

items.title: Full support
items.description: We take care of all issues with transportation and customs clearance.

items.title: Legality
items.description: All cars go through official customs clearance and registration.

items.title: Technical condition
items.description: European cars have better technical condition and maintenance.

general.title: General Provisions
general.description: These terms and conditions specify the rules for using the KRIST IN AUTO service available at www.kristinauto.com.
general.scope: The owner and administrator of the website is KRIST IN AUTO company based in Warsaw. Using the website means accepting these terms and conditions in their entirety.

personalData.title: Personal Data Protection
personalData.collection: We collect personal data such as: name and surname, email address, phone number, which are necessary to provide the services offered by our company.
personalData.purpose: Personal data is processed for the purpose of: order fulfillment, responding to inquiries, direct marketing of our products and services, conducting statistical analyses.
personalData.processing: Data administration takes place in accordance with the GDPR regulations and the Data Protection Act. You have the right to access your data, rectify it, delete it or limit its processing.
personalData.rights: You can withdraw your consent to the processing of personal data at any time, which will not affect the lawfulness of processing based on consent before its withdrawal.

cookies.title: Cookies Policy
cookies.description: Our website uses cookies, which are saved on the user's device to identify the browser when using our website.
cookies.types: We use cookies that are necessary for the operation of the website, analytical cookies (collecting information about how the website is used) and marketing cookies (enabling the delivery of personalized content).
cookies.management: The user can independently manage cookies by changing the settings of the internet browser. Disabling or limiting cookies may affect the functionality of the website.

terms.title: Terms of Website Use
terms.usage: The user is obliged to use the website in a manner consistent with the law, good practices and the provisions of the regulations.
terms.liability: KRIST IN AUTO is not responsible for interruptions in the operation of the service caused by technical reasons, system maintenance or other circumstances beyond its control.
terms.changes: We reserve the right to change the regulations at any time. Changes come into force upon their publication on the website.

contact.title: Contact for Data Protection Matters
contact.information: For matters related to the protection of personal data, you can contact us at the email address: contact.kristinauto@gmail.com or by phone at +48 732 727 686.
